Daffy Duck, P.I.: The Case of the Missing Letters

name: Daffy Duck, P.I.: The Case of the Missing Letters
summary: Daffy Duck, PI - The Case Of Missing Letters is a Puzzle game, developed by RSP and published by Psygnosis, which was released in 1991 for the PC.
